short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically enables disabled buttons, inputs, or both on websites based on user preference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Enable Disabled Buttons & Inputs is a Chrome extension created to streamline online interactions by automatically activating or enabling disabled buttons and form inputs on webpages. 

With user preferences saved, you won’t have to click the extension every time you want to enable buttons or inputs — simply set your preferences once, and let the extension do the rest!


Key Features:

Automatic Enabling: Instantly activate disabled buttons and disabled inputs or both.

User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive controls for easy customization.

Saved Preferences: Set your preferences once, and enjoy a hassle-free experience without repeated clicks.

Enhanced Accessibility: Perfect for anyone looking to improve online interactions.
